name: Crow's Quest
description:
CAW! CAW!

Retrieve the old man's potion! Play as a mischievous crow in a small medieval village. Will you do the right thing and help out the townspeople, or will you rob them of all their coin! The choice is yours in this short quest. 

  • Fly around and discover new friends and hidden items
  • Navigate the dark depths of the cave
  • Complete a quest with optional hidden objectives
  • Speak with an interesting cast of characters and choose your own dialogue

Developers

  • Scott Murray - Game Designer, Programming, Art, Animation
  • James Tanubrata - Programming, Animation
  • Joshua 'indiejobbs' Hobbs - Programming, Art
